HomePage.title: Hello! I'm Manuel Quero and I design and manufacture things
HomePage.subtitle: Self-taught and passionate about electronics, I'm always learning about PCBs, electronic components, industrial design, and programming.
HomePage.skill-1-description: Custom hardware according to the project requirements. I design schematics and PCBs, both in KiCad and Altium, and manage their manufacturing.
HomePage.skill-2-description: Design mechanical parts for the manufacture of prototypes and final pieces, using Fusion or FreeCAD. Great experience using 3D printing.
HomePage.skill-3-description: I program microcontrollers and embedded systems. Specialized in C/C++ and programming of Espressif and STM32 microcontrollers.
HomePage.skill-4-description: Study of the project requirements and development of a work plan. Also advise on the selection of components and materials.
HomePage.skill-5-description: I manufacture product prototypes to validate the design and functionalities, integrating the mechanical, electronic and software parts.
HomePage.skill-6-description: I perform validation tests, both hardware and software, using measurement instruments such as oscilloscopes, multimeters, etc.

LinksPage.title: Electronics engineer and maker | founder of kode.
LinksPage.subtitle: Connect with me on various platforms and discover my projects.

AboutPage.title: About me
AboutPage.aboutMeDescription:
I'm an industrial and automation electronics engineer and I'm passionate about designing innovative hardware solutions and programming. I've spent the last years working on various projects that combine my technical experience with creative problem-solving.
My journey in electronics design started during my university years where, due to a lack of practical and modern teaching, I started learning on my own. Thus, I developed a solid foundation in circuit design, microcontroller programming, and system integration through personal projects. Since then, I've been showcasing my projects and articles on my social media with an educational purpose.
Currently, we have created kode, a startup with which we want to revolutionize the way people learn about hardware and software.
AboutPage.experience-1-description: Internship in the design department of Celestica, performing tasks of PCB validation and electronic design.
AboutPage.experience-2-description: In kode we design hardware to learn, build and make reality the ideas of people. Take a look at kode.diy
AboutPage.contactDescription: Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or project in mind, or simply want to chat.
